subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A virtually full-strength Sweden lost to Ukraine, 1-0, in Stockholm, while the Netherlands beat Wales, 2-0, and Poland managed a 1-1 tie with Denmark less than a week before the start of European Championship. Greece, the defending champion, was held to a scoreless tie by Armenia.
